org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.impl.cache

Class CacheBasedDatasetBuilder<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.impl.cache.CacheBasedDatasetBuilder<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of a key in upstream data.
    V - Type of a value in upstream data.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetBuilder<K,V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SqlDatasetBuilder

    public class CacheBasedDatasetBuilder<K,V>
extends Object
implements DatasetBuilder<K,V>
    A dataset builder that makes CacheBasedDataset. Encapsulate logic of building cache based dataset such as allocation required data structures and initialization of context part of partitions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_RETRIES
      Default number of retries for the case when one of partitions not found on the node where loading is performed.

      • withUpstreamTransformer

        public DatasetBuilder<K,V> withUpstreamTransformer(UpstreamTransformerBuilder builder)
        Returns new instance of DatasetBuilder with new UpstreamTransformerBuilder added to chain of upstream transformer builders. When needed, each builder in chain first transformed into UpstreamTransformer, those are in turn composed together one after another forming final UpstreamTransformer. This transformer is applied to upstream data before it is passed to PartitionDataBuilder and PartitionContextBuilder. This is needed to allow transformation to upstream data which are agnostic of any changes that happen after. Such transformations may be used for deriving meta-algorithms such as bagging (see BaggingUpstreamTransformer).
        Specified by:
        withUpstreamTransformer in interface DatasetBuilder<K,V>
        Returns:
        Returns new instance of DatasetBuilder with new UpstreamTransformerBuilder added to chain of upstream transformer builders.
